DataElement.preferredName: Prior Therapy PSA Failure Administered Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for information related to the prior administration of a therapy (including surgery, radiotherapy, systemic therapy or hormonal therapies) for a biochemical relapse (PSA failure).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the prior administration of a therapy (including surgery, radiotherapy, systemic therapy or hormonal therapies) for a biochemical relapse (PSA failure).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy.

Concepts.definition: Prior action or administration of therapeutic agents that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: A rise in the blood level of PSA (prostate-specific antigen) in prostate cancer patients after treatment with surgery or radiation. PSA failure may occur in patients who do not have symptoms. It may mean that the cancer has come back.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: An increase in serum prostate-specific antigen (PSA) levels following treatment for prostate cancer.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to Alliance for by script Fri Oct 25 15:25:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient received prio
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior therapy to treat biochemical relapse (including surgery, radiotherapy, systemic, or hormonal therapies)?
